data.message: Fix disconnected nodes bug in InterSphere knowledge graph: Root cause: force-graph mutates links (string IDs → node objects). Fix: normalize all links to string IDs in addConnectionsToGraph() and convertPathToGraph() before spreading. Path highlighting now persists correctly.
data.task: Fix disconnected nodes bug in InterSphere knowledge graph
data.outcome: Root cause: force-graph mutates links (string IDs → node objects). Fix: normalize all links to string IDs in addConnectionsToGraph() and convertPathToGraph() before spreading. Path highlighting now persists correctly.
